channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report I-2023060147
item.description:
Report I-2023060147

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-16
  • City: Nashua
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: HARCROS CHEMICALS INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 5/16 at approximately 9:30 AM around 90 gis. of Caustic 50% being transferred from the rail car into the storage tank was released. The release was caused by the tank being over-filled. The lead operator mis-judged how much space was remaining in the tank. The second operator panicked and did not remember where the shut off valve was. By the time the lead operator was alerted approximately 90 gallons was released into the tank farm's dike.
